passage: Remote sensing has been a valuable tool for monitoring environmental changes, including deforestation and urbanization. With the continuous advancements in satellite technology, remote sensing has contributed to the identification of previously unknown archaeological sites. As a result, ______.
question: Which choice most logically completes the text?

choices.A: deforestation has become the primary focus of remote sensing applications, overshadowing other purposes
choices.B: satellite technology has completely replaced the need for traditional archaeological fieldwork and excavations
choices.C: urbanization has negatively affected the ability of remote sensing to detect environmental changes
choices.D: archaeologists have been able to discover and study new sites without the need for extensive on-the-ground explorations

explanation: D: 'archaeologists have been able to discover and study new sites without the need for extensive on-the-ground explorations' is the correct answer because the passage describes how remote sensing has contributed to the identification of previously unknown archaeological sites, suggesting that this technology has provided a new approach to archaeological discovery.
distractor_explanation: 'satellite technology has completely replaced the need for traditional archaeological fieldwork and excavations' is incorrect because the passage does not claim that remote sensing has entirely replaced traditional methods, only that it has contributed to the discovery of new sites

'urbanization has negatively affected the ability of remote sensing to detect environmental changes' is incorrect because the passage does not mention any negative effects of urbanization on remote sensing

'deforestation has become the primary focus of remote sensing applications, overshadowing other purposes' is incorrect because the passage does not claim that deforestation is the primary focus, only that it is one of the environmental changes that remote sensing can monitor
